title: 52-year-old man arrested after keeping mother's body at home
text:
Police in Kawaguchi, Saitama Prefecture, said Thursday they have arrested a 52-year-old unemployed man on suspicion of abandoning the body of his 80-year-old mother at their apartment.

According to police, Takashi Koizumi has admitted to leaving his mother’s body in her room after she died around mid-October, Sankei Shimbun reported. He was quoted as saying he had no money to pay for a funeral.

Police found the body after the building manager contacted them on Wednesday to say that a foul odor was coming from the apartment which was locked.

When police entered the apartment, they also found Koizumi’s 45-year-old brother in an emaciated condition. He is currently in hospital recovering.

Koizumi told police he stopped working after his mother became ill and that he didn't have much money for food.
